item.description:
Once again, however long overdue, I am hosting a day of board games at my house!

 

A few new titles have arrived such as Divinare, Chupacabra, Seasons, Masters of Commerce, and 7 Wonders:Cities expansion!  Plenty of other stuff to play as well!!  Come, bring games, bring food if you want, just come and play board games!!

 

I will be playing from 11:00 AM till whenever everyone wants to leave.  Could be a late night, but who knows!!  Just show up, have a good time, and enjoy the dice rolls!!

** CHANGE OF DATE DUE TO CONFLICT WITH ANOTHER EVENT ** (darn you Ben for moving on Saturday!!)
item.name: Lakes Region Octoberfest A La Board Games!
